html.p: This App visualizes DNS traffic and helps to pinpoint errors and anomalies like DNS-Tunneling
DNS Insight takes an output of tcpdump/tshark as input, parses it and displays results as following charts and tables:

ul.li: Number of Labels in the query

html.p:
The DNS Traffic can be collected simultaneously from many different devices:
windows (using TA-tshark or by capturing with dumpcap/tshark/Wireshark)
linux (capturing with tcpdump, a tcpdump script, or using TA-tcpdump or TA-tshark)
switch mirror port (SPAN)
TAP device
manual import from a saved network dump (pcap file)

ul.li: For a single desployment (to collect DNS traffic from one system only) you need to install Splunk Enterprise + DNS_Insight App + TA-tcpdump (Linux) or TA-tshark (Windows).

For a distributed desploymeint (to collect DNS traffic from many systems):
Windows: Splunk Universal Forwarder + TA-tshark
Linux: Splunk Universal Forwarder + TA-tcpdump
Indexer: Splunk Enterprise + DNS_Insight App + TA-tshark + TA-tcpdump
Search Head: Splunk Enterprise + DNS_Insight App + TA-tshark + TA-tcpdump
